project.name: Tryambakam Noesis - Selemene Engine Transformation
project.current_status: Halfway through crystalline-giggling-trinket plan. Foundation complete, complex engines pending.
assumptions: Swiss Ephemeris data files available in data/ephemeris/
35 wisdom-docs JSON files present in data/wisdom-docs/
Redis available for L2 cache (or mock for dev)
Bun runtime available for TypeScript engines
Team familiar with Rust async patterns (Tokio)
100% accuracy validation against reference Human Design charts available
risks: Swiss Ephemeris async initialization still needs refactor (documented limitation)
HD astronomical accuracy requires careful validation against professional software
TypeScript<->Rust bridge adds latency (acceptable for archetypal engines)
Wisdom data schema changes would require Serde struct updates
Cache invalidation strategy needs finalization for L2/L3 tiers

wave1.name: Wave 1: Complete API + Complex Astronomical Engines
wave1.focus: Finish noesis-api, implement HD/Gene Keys/Vimshottari with astronomical accuracy
deliverables: Full API routes with legacy endpoint preservation
Human Design engine with 100% accuracy validation
Integration tests for all complex engines
Accuracy validation suite against reference data

wave2.name: Wave 2: TypeScript Engines + Workflows + Polish
wave2.focus: TypeScript engines, multi-engine workflows, VedicClock/Biofield/Face Reading, production readiness

phases.name: Wave 1 Phase 1: Complete noesis-api
phases.objective: Finish API server implementation with all routes, middleware, and legacy endpoint preservation

tasks.title: Complete engine calculation route handler
tasks.deliverable: POST /api/v1/engines/:engine_id/calculate handler fully implemented with error handling
tasks.acceptance: Can call any registered engine via HTTP, returns EngineOutput JSON

tasks.title: Implement engine info route handler
tasks.deliverable: GET /api/v1/engines/:engine_id/info returns engine metadata
tasks.acceptance: Returns engine_id, name, required_phase, description

tasks.title: Implement list engines route handler
tasks.deliverable: GET /api/v1/engines returns all registered engines
tasks.acceptance: JSON array of all available engines with metadata

tasks.title: Implement workflow execution route handler
tasks.deliverable: POST /api/v1/workflows/:workflow_id/execute handler with parallel engine execution
tasks.acceptance: Can execute predefined workflows, returns WorkflowOutput with synthesized results

tasks.title: Implement workflow info route handler
tasks.deliverable: GET /api/v1/workflows/:workflow_id/info returns workflow metadata
tasks.acceptance: Returns workflow_id, name, engines_used, description

tasks.title: Implement list workflows route handler
tasks.deliverable: GET /api/v1/workflows returns all available workflows
tasks.acceptance: JSON array of 6 predefined workflows with metadata

tasks.title: Preserve legacy Panchanga endpoint
tasks.deliverable: POST /panchanga/calculate continues working with existing request/response format
tasks.acceptance: Existing Panchanga clients see no breaking changes

tasks.title: Preserve legacy Ghati endpoints
tasks.deliverable: All /ghati/* endpoints continue working
tasks.acceptance: GET /ghati/current and other ghati routes functional

tasks.title: Implement auth middleware for engine routes
tasks.deliverable: JWT + API key validation middleware on /api/v1/* routes
tasks.acceptance: Unauthorized requests return 401, valid tokens/keys proceed

tasks.title: Implement consciousness level access control
tasks.deliverable: Middleware checks user consciousness_level >= engine.required_phase()
tasks.acceptance: Users below required level get 403 with descriptive message

tasks.title: Implement CORS middleware for API routes
tasks.deliverable: CORS headers configured for cross-origin requests
tasks.acceptance: Frontend can call API from different origin

tasks.title: Implement request logging middleware
tasks.deliverable: Structured JSON logging for all requests with timing
tasks.acceptance: Logs include: method, path, status, duration_ms, user_id

tasks.title: Implement metrics middleware for engine calls
tasks.deliverable: Prometheus metrics for engine calculations (latency, count, errors)
tasks.acceptance: Metrics endpoint shows engine_calculation_duration_seconds histogram

tasks.title: Implement error response standardization
tasks.deliverable: Consistent ErrorResponse struct for all API errors
tasks.acceptance: All errors return JSON with error_code, message, details fields

tasks.title: Write integration tests for API routes
tasks.deliverable: Integration test suite covering all API endpoints
tasks.acceptance: Tests pass for happy path + error cases on all routes

tasks.title: Implement health check endpoint
tasks.deliverable: GET /health returns service health status
tasks.acceptance: Returns 200 OK with {status: healthy, uptime, version}

tasks.title: Implement readiness probe endpoint
tasks.deliverable: GET /ready checks Redis, DB connections before returning ready
tasks.acceptance: Returns 503 if dependencies unavailable, 200 if ready

tasks.title: Implement Prometheus metrics endpoint
tasks.deliverable: GET /metrics returns Prometheus-formatted metrics
tasks.acceptance: Scrape endpoint works with Prometheus, shows custom metrics

tasks.title: Configure graceful shutdown handling
tasks.deliverable: Server handles SIGTERM gracefully, drains connections
tasks.acceptance: No connection errors during rolling deployment

tasks.title: Implement request timeout middleware
tasks.deliverable: Requests timeout after 30s (configurable)
tasks.acceptance: Long-running calculations return 504 Gateway Timeout

tasks.title: Implement rate limiting middleware
tasks.deliverable: Rate limit by API key/user_id (e.g., 100 req/min)
tasks.acceptance: Excessive requests return 429 Too Many Requests

tasks.title: Configure environment-based settings
tasks.deliverable: Config struct loads from ENV vars (host, port, redis_url, etc)
tasks.acceptance: Server configurable via env without code changes

tasks.title: Write main.rs server entrypoint
tasks.deliverable: noesis-api binary starts Axum server with all routes
tasks.acceptance: cargo run -p noesis-api starts server on configured port

tasks.title: Implement OpenAPI/Swagger docs generation
tasks.deliverable: GET /api/docs serves interactive Swagger UI
tasks.acceptance: API docs auto-generated from route definitions

tasks.title: Create Docker container for noesis-api
tasks.deliverable: Dockerfile builds minimal Rust image with noesis-api binary
tasks.acceptance: docker build succeeds, container runs server

tasks.title: Write docker-compose for local development
tasks.deliverable: docker-compose.yml with API + Redis + Postgres
tasks.acceptance: docker-compose up starts full stack locally

tasks.title: Configure structured logging with tracing
tasks.deliverable: tracing subscriber configured with JSON formatter
tasks.acceptance: Logs are structured JSON with span context

phases.name: Wave 1 Phase 2: Human Design Engine (Astronomical Accuracy)
phases.objective: Implement Human Design engine with 100% accuracy validated against professional software

tasks.title: Define Human Design data structures
tasks.deliverable: Rust structs for HDChart, Gate, Center, Channel, Profile, Type, Authority
tasks.acceptance: Serde-compatible structs matching wisdom-docs schema

tasks.title: Load HD wisdom data at startup
tasks.deliverable: lazy_static loading of 12 HD JSON files into typed HashMap
tasks.acceptance: GATES, CENTERS, CHANNELS, etc. available as static refs

tasks.title: Implement Design time calculation (88-day solar arc)
tasks.deliverable: Function calculates Design time as birth_time - 88 days
tasks.acceptance: Design time matches professional HD software within 1 hour

tasks.title: Implement sequential gate mapping (1-64)
tasks.deliverable: longitude_to_gate() uses 360/64 = 5.625° per gate sequentially
tasks.acceptance: Gate numbers increment 1→64 around zodiac, NOT King Wen sequence

tasks.title: Implement line calculation within gates
tasks.deliverable: Calculate line number (1-6) from position within gate's 5.625° arc
tasks.acceptance: Lines progress 1→6 within each gate

tasks.title: Implement Personality Sun/Earth calculation
tasks.deliverable: Calculate Personality Sun gate/line, Earth = Sun + 180°
tasks.acceptance: Sun and Earth are opposite (180° apart)

tasks.title: Implement Design Sun/Earth calculation
tasks.deliverable: Calculate Design Sun/Earth at Design time (88 days before birth)
tasks.acceptance: Design positions independent of Personality positions

tasks.title: Implement all 13 planetary activations
tasks.deliverable: Calculate gate/line for Sun, Earth, Moon, North Node, South Node, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto (Personality + Design = 26 total)
tasks.acceptance: All 26 activations calculated using Swiss Ephemeris

tasks.title: Implement center definition logic
tasks.deliverable: Determine which of 9 centers are defined based on activated gates
tasks.acceptance: Centers defined when connected by channel (both gates activated)

tasks.title: Implement channel activation detection
tasks.deliverable: Find all 36 channels where both gates are activated
tasks.acceptance: Active channels listed with source (Personality/Design/Both)

tasks.title: Implement Type determination
tasks.deliverable: Determine Type based on Sacral and throat/motor connections
tasks.acceptance: Correctly identifies Generator, Manifestor, Manifesting Generator, Projector, Reflector

tasks.title: Implement Authority determination
tasks.deliverable: Determine Authority based on center definition hierarchy
tasks.acceptance: Correctly identifies Emotional, Sacral, Splenic, Ego, Self-Projected, Environmental, Lunar

tasks.title: Implement Profile calculation
tasks.deliverable: Profile = Personality Sun line / Design Sun line (e.g., 6/2)

tasks.title: Implement Definition type determination
tasks.deliverable: Determine if Single, Split, Triple Split, or Quadruple Split Definition
tasks.acceptance: Definition type matches professional software

tasks.title: Create reference chart test dataset
tasks.deliverable: 10+ reference charts from professional HD software with all expected values
tasks.acceptance: JSON file with birth_date/time/location and expected gate/line/type/authority for each

tasks.title: Write accuracy validation tests for Sun/Earth
tasks.deliverable: Unit tests validating Personality + Design Sun/Earth against references
tasks.acceptance: 100% match on Sun/Earth gate/line for all reference charts

tasks.title: Write accuracy validation tests for Type
tasks.deliverable: Unit tests validating Type determination
tasks.acceptance: 100% match on Type for all reference charts

tasks.title: Write accuracy validation tests for Authority
tasks.deliverable: Unit tests validating Authority determination
tasks.acceptance: 100% match on Authority for all reference charts

tasks.title: Write accuracy validation tests for Profile
tasks.deliverable: Unit tests validating Profile calculation
tasks.acceptance: 100% match on Profile for all reference charts

tasks.title: Write accuracy validation tests for Centers
tasks.deliverable: Unit tests validating center definition
tasks.acceptance: 100% match on defined/undefined centers for all reference charts

tasks.title: Write accuracy validation tests for Channels
tasks.deliverable: Unit tests validating channel activation
tasks.acceptance: 100% match on active channels for all reference charts

tasks.title: Implement HD witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: generate_witness_prompt() creates level-appropriate self-inquiry questions
tasks.acceptance: Prompts reference Type, Authority, Profile, Strategy in inquiry format

tasks.title: Implement ConsciousnessEngine trait for HD
tasks.deliverable: HumanDesignEngine implements calculate(), validate(), cache_key()
tasks.acceptance: Can be registered with orchestrator, callable via API

tasks.title: Register HD engine with orchestrator
tasks.deliverable: HumanDesignEngine added to orchestrator's engine registry
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/human-design/calculate works

tasks.title: Write integration tests for HD engine via API
tasks.deliverable: Integration tests calling HD engine through API
tasks.acceptance: End-to-end tests pass for HD chart generation

tasks.title: Write HD engine documentation
tasks.deliverable: .context/engines/human-design.md with calculation details
tasks.acceptance: Documents sequential gate mapping, 88-day arc, coordinate offsets

tasks.title: Benchmark HD calculation performance
tasks.deliverable: Criterion benchmark for HD chart generation
tasks.acceptance: HD chart calculates in <100ms on standard hardware

phases.name: Wave 1 Phase 3: Gene Keys + Vimshottari Engines
phases.objective: Implement Gene Keys (HD-dependent) and Vimshottari Dasha (120-year timeline) engines

tasks.title: Define Gene Keys data structures
tasks.deliverable: Rust structs for GeneKey with shadow/gift/siddhi fields
tasks.acceptance: Serde struct matching wisdom-docs/gene_keys/archetypes.json schema

tasks.title: Load Gene Keys wisdom data at startup
tasks.deliverable: lazy_static HashMap<u8, GeneKey> from archetypes.json
tasks.acceptance: All 64 Gene Keys loaded with full shadow/gift/siddhi text

tasks.title: Implement Gene Keys activation from HD gates
tasks.deliverable: Map HD gate activations to Gene Keys (1:1 correspondence)
tasks.acceptance: Gate 17 → Gene Key 17, preserving line and Personality/Design source

tasks.title: Implement Gene Keys Activation Sequence
tasks.deliverable: Calculate Life's Work, Evolution, Radiance, Purpose sequences
tasks.acceptance: 4 sequences derived from Personality Sun, Earth, Design Sun, Earth

tasks.title: Implement consciousness frequency assessment
tasks.deliverable: Map user's current state to shadow/gift/siddhi frequency per key
tasks.acceptance: Returns assessment indicating shadow dominance vs gift emergence

tasks.title: Implement transformation pathway guidance
tasks.deliverable: Generate transformation map: Shadow → Gift → Siddhi for each active key
tasks.acceptance: Provides specific practices/inquiries for frequency shifts

tasks.title: Implement Gene Keys witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Generate prompts specific to shadow/gift/siddhi recognition
tasks.acceptance: Prompts invite witnessing unconscious patterns (shadow) without identifying

tasks.title: Implement ConsciousnessEngine trait for Gene Keys
tasks.deliverable: GeneKeysEngine implements trait, depends on HD for gate activations
tasks.acceptance: Can calculate Gene Keys chart given HD gates or birth data

tasks.title: Register Gene Keys engine with orchestrator
tasks.deliverable: GeneKeysEngine added to registry
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/gene-keys/calculate works

tasks.title: Write integration tests for Gene Keys engine
tasks.deliverable: Test Gene Keys calculation via API
tasks.acceptance: Returns valid Gene Keys chart with shadow/gift/siddhi for all activations

tasks.title: Validate Gene Keys archetypal depth preservation
tasks.deliverable: Verify full shadow/gift/siddhi text returned, not summaries
tasks.acceptance: Response includes complete archetypal descriptions from wisdom-docs

tasks.title: Define Vimshottari data structures
tasks.deliverable: Rust structs for Mahadasha, Antardasha, Pratyantardasha with dates
tasks.acceptance: Serde structs for 120-year timeline with nested periods

tasks.title: Load Vimshottari wisdom data at startup
tasks.deliverable: lazy_static loading of vimshottari_periods.json and nakshatras.json
tasks.acceptance: Period lengths and nakshatra rulers available

tasks.title: Implement birth nakshatra calculation
tasks.deliverable: Calculate Moon's nakshatra at birth using Swiss Ephemeris
tasks.acceptance: Birth nakshatra determines starting Mahadasha lord

tasks.title: Implement Mahadasha period calculation
tasks.deliverable: Calculate 9 Mahadasha periods starting from birth nakshatra
tasks.acceptance: 120-year cycle: Sun(6y), Moon(10y), Mars(7y), Rahu(18y), Jupiter(16y), Saturn(19y), Mercury(17y), Ketu(7y), Venus(20y)

tasks.title: Implement balance of dasha at birth
tasks.deliverable: Calculate remaining balance of starting Mahadasha based on Moon position in nakshatra
tasks.acceptance: Partial first Mahadasha correctly calculated

tasks.title: Implement Antardasha calculation
tasks.deliverable: Subdivide each Mahadasha into 9 Antardashas
tasks.acceptance: Each Mahadasha contains correct Antardasha sequence with dates

tasks.title: Implement Pratyantardasha calculation
tasks.deliverable: Subdivide each Antardasha into 9 Pratyantar dashas
tasks.acceptance: Three-level nested dasha structure complete

tasks.title: Implement current dasha period detection
tasks.deliverable: Given current date, return active Maha/Antar/Pratyantardasha
tasks.acceptance: Correctly identifies current period at any date

tasks.title: Implement upcoming transitions calculation
tasks.deliverable: Calculate next N dasha transitions with dates
tasks.acceptance: Returns upcoming period changes for planning

tasks.title: Add planetary quality descriptions
tasks.deliverable: Enrich each period with planet's qualities/themes from wisdom data
tasks.acceptance: Dasha periods include descriptive text (e.g., Jupiter: expansion, wisdom)

tasks.title: Implement Vimshottari witness prompt generation
tasks.deliverable: Generate prompts asking user to witness current dasha themes
tasks.acceptance: Prompts reference current period energy without prescribing actions

tasks.title: Implement ConsciousnessEngine trait for Vimshottari
tasks.deliverable: VimshottariEngine implements trait
tasks.acceptance: Returns 120-year timeline + current period + witness prompt

tasks.title: Register Vimshottari engine with orchestrator
tasks.deliverable: VimshottariEngine added to registry
tasks.acceptance: POST /api/v1/engines/vimshottari/calculate works

tasks.title: Write integration tests for Vimshottari engine
tasks.deliverable: Test dasha calculation via API with known birth dates
tasks.acceptance: Validates dasha periods match Vedic astrology references

phases.name: Wave 1 Phase 4: Integration Testing + Documentation
phases.objective: Comprehensive testing of Wave 1 deliverables, performance validation, documentation

tasks.title: Write E2E test for full HD chart via API
tasks.deliverable: Complete workflow: HTTP request → HD chart calculation → cache → response
tasks.acceptance: E2E test covers auth, calculation, caching, metrics

tasks.title: Write E2E test for Gene Keys via API
tasks.deliverable: E2E test for Gene Keys calculation
tasks.acceptance: Validates shadow/gift/siddhi returned correctly

tasks.title: Write E2E test for Vimshottari via API
tasks.deliverable: E2E test for dasha timeline calculation
tasks.acceptance: Validates 120-year timeline structure

tasks.title: Write cache hit rate verification tests
tasks.deliverable: Test identical requests hit cache (L1→L2→L3 cascade)
tasks.acceptance: Second identical request returns cached result <10ms

tasks.title: Write parallel workflow execution test
tasks.deliverable: Test that multi-engine workflows use tokio::join! parallelism
tasks.acceptance: 3-engine workflow completes in ~max(engine_time), not sum

tasks.title: Benchmark HD calculation performance
tasks.deliverable: Criterion benchmark for HD chart generation
tasks.acceptance: <100ms per chart on standard hardware

tasks.title: Benchmark Gene Keys calculation performance
tasks.deliverable: Criterion benchmark for Gene Keys
tasks.acceptance: <50ms per calculation (simpler than HD)

tasks.title: Benchmark Vimshottari calculation performance
tasks.deliverable: Criterion benchmark for 120-year dasha timeline
tasks.acceptance: <200ms for full timeline generation

tasks.title: Load test API with concurrent requests
tasks.deliverable: Use k6/locust to test 100 concurrent users
tasks.acceptance: API maintains <500ms p95 latency under load

tasks.title: Test cache invalidation strategies
tasks.deliverable: Verify TTL expiration, manual invalidation work correctly
tasks.acceptance: Expired entries recalculated, manual clear works

tasks.title: Test error handling and recovery
tasks.deliverable: Test invalid input, missing data, network failures
tasks.acceptance: All error cases return structured ErrorResponse

tasks.title: Update .context documentation with Wave 1 learnings
tasks.deliverable: Update .context/engines/ and .context/architecture/ with implementation details
tasks.acceptance: Documentation reflects actual implementation patterns
